name: Youtube Banner

attribute_definition_groups.description: This is a component will host a Youtube video.

attribute_definitions.name: The Youtube video ID
attribute_definitions.description: Provide the YouTube video ID that identifies the video that the player will load.

attribute_definitions.name: The width of the video player
attribute_definitions.description: Provide the width of the video player or set 0 for 100% width. The default value is 100%.

attribute_definitions.name: The height of the video player
attribute_definitions.description: Provide the height of the video player. The default value is 390.

attribute_definitions.name: Automatically start playing video
attribute_definitions.description: Automatically start playing video when the player loads.

attribute_definitions.name: Display player controls
attribute_definitions.description: isplay player controls in the video player.

attribute_definitions.name: Loop the Video
attribute_definitions.description: Loop to play video again and again.
